getMinFrequency().Description: Get the minimum (inclusive) frequency in this range segment.

getMaxFrequency().Description: Get the maximum (inclusive) frequency in this range segment.

Parameters: int: The minimum transmittable frequency in this range segment.
int: The maximum transmittable frequency in this range segment.
ConsumerIrManager.CarrierFrequencyRange(.Description: Create a segment of a carrier frequency range.

ClassDesc: Represents a range of carrier frequencies (inclusive) on which the infrared transmitter can transmit
